title:
Transposed Poisson structures on the extended Schr\"odinger-Virasoro and
  the original deformative Schr\"odinger-Virasoro algebras
abstract:
We compute 1/2-derivations on the extended Schr\"odinger-Virasoro algebras
and the original deformative Schr\"odinger-Virasoro algebras. The extended
Schr\"odinger-Virasoro algebras have neither nontrivial 1/2-derivations nor
nontrivial transposed Poisson algebra structures. We demonstrate that the
original deformative Schr\"odinger-Virasoro algebras have nontrivial
1/2-derivations, indicating that they possess nontrivial transposed Poisson
structures.
